metadata.synopsis: Character interacts with a pile of pet collars.Different reaction depending on whether the user has read the missing pet posters before or not.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on |Pile of Pet Collars - STUB| - S_TWN_MissingPetsCollarsPile - b7680bb0-4a59-4b66-ad76-f9d332265b9a - (-111 25 -47)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: 'Rascal.'? 'Jagoda.'? All these collars belonged to pets.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Blood-stained collars? Guess I know what happened to all those missing pets.
